title: Welcome to Chechnya
creator_credit: Askold Kurov, David France, Tyler H. Walk, Alice Henty, BBC Storyville, Maylo Films, Ninety Thousand Words, David France & Joy A. Tomchin Film, Public Square Films and HBO Documentary Films
brief_description: This searing investigative work shadows a group of activists risking unimaginable peril to confront the ongoing anti-LGBTQ program raging in the repressive and closed Russian republic. Unfettered access and a remarkable approach to protecting anonymity exposes this under-reported atrocity–and an extraordinary group of people confronting evil.

constellations_primary.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_primary.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.
